title: Til sölu: MXR 6-Band Graphic Equalizer, vintage Sescom SM-1A Passive Direct Box og Arion SAD-3 Analog Delay
text:
Þessir eru til sölu,
MXR 6-Band Graphic Equalizer
8.000 kr.
http://di1-1.shoppingshadow.com/images/pi/21/a6/ec/29469635-260x260-0-0_MXR+Mxr+M+109+6+Band+Graphic+Equalizer+Pedal.jpg
Sescom SM-1A DI Box
7.000 kr. eða besta boð
http://www.vintage-music-equipment.de/connys-studio/guitaramps/sescom-sm-1a-special-design-di-for-guitars
Arion SAD-3 Analog Delay
9.000 kr.

6916850

replies.text: Ég mæli eindregið með SAD-3 delayinum, ég á einn svoleis :)
